content.name: keyboard
content.label: Keyboard
content.gloss: a panel of keys that operate a computer or typewriter

content.name: cord
content.label: Cord
content.gloss: a cord or connector line that connects the keyboard to the computer

content.name: frame
content.label: Frame
content.gloss: the main frame part for the keyboard

content.name: tilt_leg
content.label: Tilt Leg
content.gloss: a short leg at the back of the keyboard that is used to tilt the keyboard up
